content:
Professional Steel Detailing Services

Structural steel detailing requires precision and expertise.

ASISA's expert steel services

ASISA's structural steel services provide accurate shop drawings, connection designs, and fabrication details. Our team specializes in Tekla Structures, Advance Steel, and SDS/2, delivering high-quality steel detailing solutions. We create detailed shop drawings that fabricators can use directly, reducing errors and saving time.

Why Choose ASISA?

ASISA's offshore steel detailing support offers significant cost savings while maintaining quality standards. Our services include 3D modeling, connection design, material lists, and NC file generation. We coordinate steel with other building systems to ensure proper integration.

Our Services

Our steel detailers understand fabrication methods and can optimize designs for cost and efficiency. We provide quality control checks and ensure drawings meet project specifications. With ASISA's structural steel services, you get accurate, coordinated drawings that streamline fabrication and erection. Partner with ASISA for professional steel detailing that delivers value. Our steel detailers use Tekla Structures, Advance Steel, SDS/2, and other specialized software. We create detailed shop drawings, connection designs, and fabrication details that fabricators can use directly. ASISA's offshore steel detailing services offer significant cost savings while maintaining quality standards. We coordinate steel with architectural, structural, and MEP systems to ensure proper integration. Our team understands fabrication methods and can optimize designs.
